2.Name: Tina's Mindrealm
2.ActDes: Revisit the main dungeon "Tina's Mindrealm" to experience the full story and uncover special in-dungeon events.
2.UnlockDes: Unlocked after completing the quest [Night Suspended on the Precipice]

3.Name: Towering Ruin
3.ActDes: Revisit the main dungeon "Towering Ruin" to experience the full storyline and uncover special in-dungeon events.
3.UnlockDes: Unlocked after completing the quest [Night Suspended on the Precipice]

103.Name: Dragon Claw Valley
103.ActDes: Re-explore the main story dungeon "Dragon Claw Valley", experience the complete dungeon story, and discover special events within the dungeon.

5.Name: Tina's Mindrealm
5.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.
5.UnlockDes: Unlocked after completing the quest [Night Suspended on the Precipice]

6.Name: Towering Ruin
6.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.

7.Name: Goblin Lair
7.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.

8.Name: Kanamia Tribe
8.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.

101.Name: Dragon Claw Valley
101.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.

104.Name: Dark Mist Fortress
104.ActDes: Head to the "Unit X" Research Facility to uncover the secrets of giant machines! Whether solo or in a team, it's your main source of gear. Rewards don't stack.

9.Name: Daily Mission
9.ActDes: Complete dungeons, explorations, and other activities to obtain EXP and Honor Coins. Rewards don't stack.

10.Name: Bureau Commissions
10.ActDes: Pioneer Bureau posts 3 quests daily, an important source of Honor Coins! Supports solo or team completion. Commissions can accumulate for up to 3 days.

11.Name: Elite Hunt
11.ActDes:
Hunt elite monsters in the wild! Use daily loot keys to open chests and obtain rich rewards. Keys can stack for up to 3 days.
Only the player or team that lands the first hit gets chest access!

12.Name: Boss Hunt
12.ActDes:
Hunt elite monsters in the wild! Use daily loot keys to open chests and obtain rich rewards-keys can stack for up to 3 days.
Defeating a boss grants extra rewards with a chance to obtain gears.

14.Name: Tina's Mindrealm
14.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm pushes adventurers to their limits. Each clear offers chances at great rewards.

Drop: Weapon (low), Helmet, Necklace

15.Name: Towering Ruin
15.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm pushes adventurers to their limits. Each clear offers chances at great rewards.

Drop: Weapon (low), Armor, Ring

16.Name: Goblin Lair
16.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm offers more powerful boss mechanics and monster abilities, challenging adventurers to their true limits! Each clear has a chance to grant gear and materials. Additionally, there's a chance to get exclusive appearance items of the current dungeon!
Drop: Weapon (low chance), Gauntlets, Earrings

17.Name: Kanamia Tribe
17.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm pushes adventurers to their limits. Each clear offers chances at great rewards.

Drop: Weapon (low), Shoes, Charm

102.Name: Dragon Claw Valley
102.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm pushes adventurers to their limits. Each clear offers chances at great rewards.

Drop: Weapon (low), Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R)

105.Name: Dark Mist Fortress
105.ActDes:
Chaotic Realm pushes adventurers to their limits. Each clear offers chances at great rewards.

Drop: Weapon (high) and other parts (low)

18.Name: World Boss Crusade
18.ActDes: You can battle with up to 20 players to showcase your superior skills! Work together to defeat the World Boss and win generous rewards!

19.Name: Fishing
19.ActDes: Cast your line to challenge unknown fish species, let's see what you can catch.

20.Name: Guild Cargo
20.ActDes: Join a Guild and take on cargo quests at the Guild Center to obtain Luno and Guild Tokens! Tokens can be exchanged for refining materials, dyes, cosmetics, and more. Rewards don't stack, so be sure to join in daily!

21.Name: Trial Path
21.ActDes: Take the Class Trials to master your class! Complete the trial and unlock exclusive items to boost your class talents and elevate your class Level!

26.Name: Exploration
26.ActDes: Every place where Engram flows is full of vitality. Explore unknown areas to gain not only precious treasures but also unique experiences.
26.UnlockDes: Unlocks after completing the quest [New Discovery - Part Three]

27.Name: Fireworks Festival
27.ActDes: Fireworks will light up the sky at Asterleeds. Adventurers are specially invited to dress up and share in this romantic experience!
27.OtherDes:
Opens with the Seabreeze Festival event
Recommend: Solo/Team Challenge

28.Name: Stimen Vaults
28.ActDes: "Forge the Inverted Spire-an arrow driven into the earth." Descend into the mysterious Bapharian Ruins and uncover hidden secrets. Team up, explore the depths, and claim great rewards! Stimen Vaults reset every two weeks.
28.OtherDes:
All day
Weekly Reset:​​ Mon. 02:00 - 05:00(UTC-2)
Recommend: Team Challenge

29.Name: Guild Hunt
29.ActDes: Team up with your Guild to hunt in the wilds, complete shared goals, and obtain challenge rewards!

30.Name: Guild Dance
30.ActDes: Show off your dance moves on the Guild stage to obtain rewards and boost your hunting comrades!

31.Name: Guild Activity
31.ActDes: Join a Guild and work with members to complete weekly goals and obtain rewards like Guild Tokens!

32.Name: Magical Creatures
32.ActDes:
Cute Boarlets and rare Nappos appear randomly on the plains! Defeat them for a chance at rare items.
Scheduled: Lovely Boarlet, Breezy Boarlet.
Random: Loyal Boarlet, Golden Nappo, Silver Nappo.

33.Name: Check-in
33.ActDes: Go to the Guild for daily check-in activities

34.Name: Life Skill
34.ActDes: Learn a Life Skill that interests you, use your daily Focus wisely to level it up, and harvest various sellable materials.

35.Name: Botany
35.ActDes: Gather various flowers, herbs, mushrooms, and fruits in the wild. The materials obtained are primarily supplied to the Alchemy and Culinary classes.

36.Name: Mineralogy
36.ActDes: Mine various metal ores in the wild. The materials obtained are primarily supplied to the Smelting class for processing.

37.Name: Gemology
37.ActDes: Gather various crystal ores in the wild. The materials obtained are primarily supplied to the Gemcraftingship class for processing.

23.Name: Culinary
23.ActDes: Combine ingredients by recipe to cook dishes that restore HP and grant buffs-an essential prep tip for every adventurer!

38.Name: Alchemy
38.ActDes: A mysterious craft that can make instant recovery potions, elemental damage boosting potions, and resistance potions, providing ample preparation for exploration and combat. Additionally, it can be used to create dyes and some toys.

39.Name: Smelting
39.ActDes: A craft focused on processing metal ores, primarily creating materials needed for refining different gear parts. It can also produce metal products required by other crafts.

40.Name: Gemcrafting
40.ActDes: A craft focused on processing various Gems, primarily creating energy-imbued gems for socketing. It can also produce raw materials needed for crafting dyes.

41.Name: Artisanry
41.ActDes: A profession specializing in processing various types of wood. Can craft wooden materials, wooden furniture, and flux agents.

42.Name: Weaving
42.ActDes: This profession produces various threads, fabrics, and leather goods, and also makes dyes and furniture.

50.Name: Floating Island - Dragon Shackles
50.ActDes: The Bapharian Legacy has resurfaced on the Floating Island, quietly stirring a surge of energy that opens a gateway to the unknown. Three forces intertwine, and from afar, the echo of an ancient dragon's awakening can be heard.

201.Name: City Rally
201.ActDes:
Ride your beloved mount and complete the Asterleeds circuit race! Feel the sea breeze, witness the waves, and hear the roar of the engines. Young rider, go create a new legend!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

202.Name: Wasteland Race
202.ActDes:
Only the winner takes the trophy!
Obtain Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day.

203.Name: Balloon Capture
203.ActDes:
Balloons are suspended in midair. Players must work together to create clouds to reach them and earn rewards!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

204.Name: Ancient City Patrol
204.ActDes:
Join Asterleeds Troopers on scheduled raids to clear goblins in the Ancient City of Vill. Follow the troopers, and you'll earn rewards at regular intervals!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

205.Name: Brigand Camp Patrol
205.ActDes:
Join Asterleeds Troopers on scheduled raids to clear Brigands at the Brigand camp. Follow the troopers, and you'll earn rewards at regular intervals!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.
205.OtherDes: Departs daily at 12:45, 17:45, and 22:45(UTC-2), starting from the Day3 after server launch

206.Name: Muku Camp Patrol
206.ActDes:
Join Kanamia warriors on scheduled raids to clear Mukus at the Muku camp. Follow the warriors, and you'll earn rewards at regular intervals!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.
206.OtherDes: Departs Daily at 13:45, 18:45, and 23:45(UTC-2), starting from the Day5 after server launch

207.Name: Dance Novice
207.ActDes:
Dancer Zoraida leads a dance session on the bridge. Come join the fun! Stay within the designated area, and you'll earn rewards at regular intervals!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

208.Name: Street Theater
208.ActDes:
Asterleeds is hosting a live street performance where participants act out specific characters. Come vote for your favorites! Stay within the designated area, and you'll earn rewards at regular intervals!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

209.Name: Charming Fish Parade
209.ActDes:
The Fishing Guild is hosting the "Charming Fish Parade." Hurry, bring your fish and join the fun!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

210.Name: Boarlet Knight Parade
210.ActDes:
A Lovely Boarlet has appeared in town! She's the mascot of the Boarlet Riders. Mount a Boarlet to join her riding parade!
Receive Friendship Points and Gear for your first participation each day. Repeated participation on the same day grants a small amount of Friendship Points. A weekly cap applies.

211.Name: Ee-chan, don't stare at me!
211.ActDes:
When Ee-chan turns back, it's your chance to run! But be careful, Ee-chan might look back at any moment... If you're caught, you'll have to start over. Reach the finish line without being spotted to win the game!
Your first participation of the day grants Friendship Points and Gears. Repeat attempts grant few friendship points. A weekly cap applies.

401.Name: Starlight Fireworks
401.ActDes: A gentle sea breeze, fireworks blooming just for you. During the event, head to the beach and search for treasures prepared by the stars and fireworks. Receive a large amount of Friendship Points, Silver Star Badges, and gear materials for your first participation each day.

402.Name: Starlight Fireworks
402.ActDes: A gentle sea breeze, fireworks blooming just for you. During the event, head to the beach and search for treasures prepared by the stars and fireworks. Receive a large amount of Friendship Points, Silver Star Badges, and gear materials for your first participation each day.

302.Name: Starlight Fireworks
302.ActDes:
A gentle sea breeze, fireworks blooming just for you. During the event, head to the beach and search for treasures prepared by the stars and fireworks.
Event Time:
10/09-10/12, 10/17-10/18, 10/24-10/25, 10/31-11/01, 11/07-11/08
Opens at 20:20, 20:44, 21:08, 21:32, and 21:56 every night, each window lasting 10 minutes.
302.PreDec: A gentle sea breeze, fireworks blooming just for you. Each night, head to the beach and search for treasures prepared by the stars and fireworks.

303.Name: Spindrift Supply
303.ActDes:
Welcome to the Spindrift Supply! Deliver daily life materials to earn Silver Star Badges and help light up the Seabreeze Festival skies.
During the event, complete material collection quests from Gaido at the Asterleeds Artisan Guild to earn extra Silver Star Badges. Redeem them at the Seabreeze Store for tons of rewards!
Material collection quests require unlocking the corresponding life skill first. After completing the guide quest, you can accept the quest.
303.PreDec:
Welcome to the Spindrift Supply! Deliver daily life materials to earn Silver Star Badges and help light up the Seabreeze Festival skies.
During the event, complete material collection quests from Gaido at the Asterleeds Artisan Guild to earn extra Silver Star Badges. Redeem them at the Seabreeze Store for tons of rewards!

304.Name: Silverstar Carnival
304.ActDes:
Starlight falls, and the festivities begin. Join a variety of active events to gather Silver Star Badges and celebrate with your friends!
Earn bonus Silver Star Badges from: Bureau Commissions, Unstable Space, Guild's Cargo Operations, first-time casual modes, and Activity Chests. Redeem them in the Seabreeze Store for plentiful rewards!
304.PreDec: Starlight falls, and the festivities begin. Join a variety of active events to gather Silver Star Badges and celebrate with your friends!

305.Name: Seabreeze Gifts
305.PreDec: Each morning brings a gift. The seabreeze never forgets those who celebrate with heart.

306.Name: Windsoothe Parade
306.PreDec: Step onto the parade path, and let the sea breeze guide you through every festive scene. They say each stop along the way is a wish offered to the ocean.

307.Name: Adept's Trial
307.ActDes:
Before the dragon's shadow descends, the stars shall sound the horn of valor. Enter the arena and take on the Adept's Trial of Dragon Shackles!
During the event, adventurers of Level 30+ can participate in the Adept's Trial. Defeating monsters within will grant Silver Star Badges and Adept Medals. Adept Medals can be exchanged in the Seabreeze Store for Lv.40 Legendary Gear - Select Chests and Runic Alloy Shards!
307.PreDec: Before the dragon's shadow descends, the stars shall sound the horn of valor. Enter the arena and take on the Adept's Trial of Dragon Shackles!

308.Name: Master's Trial
308.ActDes:
Explore the depths of the Chaotic Realm warped by primal Void Corruption Power and rise as a Void Vanguard!
During the event, the [Master's Trial!] quest will auto-activate. Reach 2,000 points in Master Mode to complete the event and earn a permanent exclusive reward!
Master 5 is affected by the "Void Vanguard." During the event, all enemies gain significant stat boosts.
308.PreDec:
Explore the depths of the Chaotic Realm warped by primal Void Corruption Power and rise as a Void Vanguard!
During the event, the [Master's Trial!] quest will auto-activate. Reach 2,000 points in Master Mode to complete the event and earn a permanent exclusive reward!

310.Name: Voyage's Memento​
310.PreDec: As summer fades and autumn arrives, time moves on. Yet, the traces of a life well-lived are never forgotten.

10000.Name: Adept's Trial
10000.ActDes: Before the dragon's shadow descends, the stars shall sound the horn of valor. Enter the arena and take on the Adept's Trial of Dragon Shackles!
